title: Developer Journal Website
description: Led a team to develop a note-taking and task management website. Features include markdown formatting, dark/light mode, local storage, and a CI/CD pipeline using Jest and ESLint.

title: Checkers AI Solver
description: Designed and implemented a Checkers AI employing Minimax algorithm for strategic decision-making, with Alpha-Beta Pruning for optimization. Built a web interface using Flask for real-time interaction with the AI.

title: Food Image Classifier
description: Built a convolutional neural network (CNN) to classify 101,000 food images with 75% accuracy. Leveraged TensorFlow and Keras for model design, training, and deployment.

title: Ride Fare Predictor
description: Developed a machine learning model to predict ride fares based on features like distance, time, and traffic conditions. Preprocessed datasets, performed feature engineering, and implemented a regression model using TensorFlow and Keras. Evaluated model performance and utilized Python libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn for data processing.

title: Flix App
description: Developed a movie browsing platform using Swift and API integration with TMDB for real-time data fetching and display.
